name: Some weird Puzzle gem
description:
Goal:

Try to get every Object (including you) inside of the blue area.

The catch is: All the other Objects move in the opposite direction!

There are 8 Levels so far.

Controls:

Move with WASD or Arrow keys

Reset Level with R

Zoom with the Scrollbar

Open the Menu with M

Other:

A Trello board for the game: https://trello.com/b/jRob6ZKQ
